name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Remote Data Engineer with 8 years of Full Stack Development experience, I excel in managing the job cycle process and real-time job monitoring within the digital oilfield domain. My technical proficiency includes building high-performance solutions using **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, integrating with **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** frameworks. I have substantial experience in utilizing cloud services such as **Azure** and **AWS** to deploy robust data solutions that ensure compliance with industry standards.

I am skilled in problem-solving and communication, capable of overseeing technical equipment and implementing effective transmission protocols. My background includes developing and maintaining machine learning pipelines, serving ML models in production, and driving MLOps workflows using tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. My expertise in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation allows for agile project delivery and high-quality outputs, all while leveraging strong analytical skills to enhance data processing efficiencies.
